```

```

```

      change y by (10)

      when I receive [down v]
      change y by (-10) 
    ```

```
     when stage clicked
      broadcast (visit v) 
    ```

```
     when I receive [visit v]
      point towards (mouse-pointer v)
      glide (1) secs to (mouse-pointer v) 
    ```

```
     when this sprite clicked
      create clone of (myself v)

      when I start as a clone
      glide (1) secs to (random position v) 
    ```

```
     when [left arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (-10)

      when [right arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (10) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to x: (0) y: (-125)
    ```
```
      set [catches v] to (0)
      say (Catch the crystals without letting them hit the ground!) for (4) seconds
    ```

```
     when I start as a clone
      show
      go to x: (0) y: (160)

      change y by (-2)

      change [catches v] by (1)
      create clone of (myself v)
      delete this clone
    ```

```
     when I start as a clone
      show
      go to x: (pick random (-200) to (200)) y: (160) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to x: (0) y: (-125)
      set [catches v] to (0)
      set [misses v] to (0)
      say (Catch the crystals without letting them hit the ground!) for (4) seconds
      broadcast (begin v) 
    ```

```
     when I start as a clone
      show
      go to x: (0) y: (160)
      forever
      change y by (-2)
      if <touching (Cat v) ?> then
      change [catches v] by (1)
      create clone of (myself v)
      delete this clone
      end
      if <touching (edge v) ?> then
      change [misses v] by (1)
      create clone of (myself v)
      delete this clone
      end 
    ```

```
     if <touching (edge v) ?> then
      change [misses v] by (1)
      if <(misses) = (3)> then
      broadcast (game over v)
      delete this clone
      end
      create clone of (myself v)
      delete this clone
      end 
    ```

```
     when I receive [game over v]
      say (join (Your score is) (catches)) for (5) seconds 
    ```

```
     when I receive [begin v]
      forever
      create clone of (myself v)
      wait (15) seconds 
    ```

```
     when I receive [game over v]
      say (join (Your score is) (catches)) for (5) seconds
    ```
